name: A Simple Rage (Kind of) Game
description:
-Try to collect all the points and reach the goal before the timer runs out!!!!
 -OTHERWISE YOU MIGHT EXPLODE!!!!!! 
-Try to beat youre best time in each level.
-Controls: 
{
-Space - Rapidly Tap to jump higher. 
-A - While jumping hold in or tap to go left. 
-D - While jumping hold in or tap to go right.
}
-This is my first ever game so be ready for anything!!!
 -I'm planning on adding more levels and improving the game in the future and adding more content.
 -Aslo feel free to post in the comments any improvements i should do or content i should add to the game.
